TopicTitle: [1.1.x] In Flight Flag Switcher - Switch flags on the fly — literally! [Apr 19]

Articles.Content:
**AS OF AUGUST 9TH 2016, I AM NO LONGER WORKING ON ANY MODS FOR KSP. FOR MORE INFO, SEE [THIS PASTEBIN](http://pastebin.com/sgvHHM6J).**

**DEVELOPMENT OF THIS MOD HAS BEEN TAKEN OVER BY [@adsii1970](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/89014-adsii1970/). YOU CAN FIND THEIR THREAD [HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/151525-121-in-flight-flag-switcher-v-11-04-11-2016).**

Ever launched a rocket to discovered you forgot to change your mission flag? Previously, you'd have to revert to the editor (or recover), switch the flag and launch again... NOT ANY MORE!

With this carefully crafted file of specifically chosen letters you can change your flag at any time while in the flight scene. Mun, Minmus, Eve, below Jool's surface... you name it, you can change your flag there.

Just click the handy-dandy button that shows your current flag on the toolbar (which will show the flag of your vessel's root part), pick your new flag and you're done! Exactly how do all the flags on your ship get reprinted in an instant? Well, actually, we don't know, but we're told it has something to do with portals and toasters or something. We're sure it's all very complicated.

Please note this will only effect your active vessel. Our toasters aren't powerful enough to do it on a global scale, or at least that's what the scientists told us.

Planted a flag on a planet only to realise it's not the right one? You can change those, too!

Our top scientists tell us that it should work with any part mod, so long as they don't use a custom FlagDecal module, whatever that is.

[Download from Github](https://github.com/iPeer/InFlightFlagSwitcher/releases/latest)  

On <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> as **InFlightFlagSwitcher**

[Bug reporting guidelines](https://github.com/iPeer/AGroupOnStage/wiki/Reporting-Bugs)

[Source code](https://github.com/iPeer/InFlightFlagSwitcher) is licensed under [GNU GPL v3](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html)

Part by part flag changing requires [Module Manager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55219) (included)!

**CHANGELOG**

**Dates are dd/mm/yy**

    19/04/16, v1.0.2:* Updated to work with KSP 1.1
    
    09/11/15, v1.0.1:* Recompiled against KSP 1.0.5 binaries
    
    06/07/15, v1.0:* Initial public release!
    
    05/07/15, v1.0-dev3:* Fixed toolbar button not updating to the flag of other vessels when they're switched to* Pre-release code refactoring!* Can now toggle flag on a part-by-part basis (Right click the part you want to switch and hit "Change Flag")
    
    04/07/15, v1.0-dev2:* No longer allows changing of flags while controlling Kerbals.* Button will now remain visible while in map view.
    
    03/07/15, v1.0-dev1:* Initial private release.

This is perfect! I'm surprised it took us this long to finally get this mod! Thanks! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I was looking for a mod similar to this one for a long time now. The thing that I wanted was to be able to choose the flag I was to plant in a planet, without being the same as my vessel. I see at the description of the mod that it would be possible with it, but I can't find how to change the flag I'm going to plant on the planet. Am I missing something?

Anyway, I already like this mod.

Yes, too many times I forget to switch the falg and have to revert the flight. This mod will come in handy. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Centraldoxadrez, you can plant a flag on the planet/moon, then switch to the actual flag and change that there and all should be fine with the one on the craft. It's a little roundabout but it works! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Very cool! I've been wanting something like this for a while. I like using a custom mission patch for my missions, but when I plant the flag somewhere I like to use my "nation" flag - this lets me do just that! 

However I wasn't able to change the flag for a Kerbal once they were on EVA, I had to change the craft's flag, leave the craft, then switch back to the craft, change its flag again, then back to the Kerbal. I hope that makese sense, it's confusing ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It would be nice to change the flag on the fly for the Kerbal. Very cool regardless - Minmus Selfie:

![GhMWf1o.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/GhMWf1o.jpg)

Note that in the upper right the Flag Icon is greyed out and can't be selected! It's also distorted, it'd be nice if that could be fixed, but I suspect that would be difficult since you're squishing a rectangle down to a square. Maybe change the size of the icon? Dunno. Sorry about the giant image. 

Unrelated thought: Speaking of flags, do you know how to make the game refresh ONLY the flags folder of the game? For example, if I want to alt tab out of the game, change a flag, go back in, then refresh it. 

Again, awesome work. Thanks! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

Just realized that you can skip my step of changing the flag from the craft by **switching to the flag, and changing it there.** Cool. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
